en: Could you gift wrap it?
zh: 可以帮我包装一下吗？

en: Thank you for your present.
zh: 谢谢你的礼物。

en: Will the present make him happier?
zh: 这个礼物会让他更开心吗？

en: It is best to review the material before the presentation.
zh: 最好在演示之前复习一下材料。

en: Please give us a 20-30 min. time slot for our presentation.
zh: 请给我们20-30分钟的时间来进行演示。

en: Since PlayStation 2 came out the game software store shelves have bloomed riotously with colorful new titles.
zh: 自从PlayStation 2问世以来，游戏软件商店的货架上就琳琅满目地摆满了色彩鲜艳的新游戏。

en: I'm really looking forward to next March, when they roll out the new Play Station 2.
zh: 我真的很期待明年三月，他们推出新的Play Station 2。

en: Blake loved to walk in the country round London.
zh: 布莱克喜欢在伦敦周围的乡村散步。

en: Press the brake pedal to turn on your brake lights.
zh: 踩下刹车踏板以打开刹车灯。

en: The function of the brake is to stop the car.
zh: 刹车的功能是使汽车停止。

en: Something is wrong with the brakes.
zh: 刹车出问题了。

en: The brakes did not work.
zh: 刹车失灵了。

en: You must be crazy to ride a bicycle that has no brakes!
zh: 骑一辆没有刹车的自行车，你一定是疯了！

en: The brake isn't working well.
zh: 刹车不太好使。

en: The brake didn't work.
zh: 刹车失灵了。

en: The brake stopped working.
zh: 刹车坏了。

en: Come and join us.
zh: 来加入我们吧。

en: Plain English is a shortcut to the goal of language learning.
zh: 简明英语是语言学习目标的捷径。

en: It seems that Mr Brooke is an honest man.
zh: 看来布鲁克先生是个诚实的人。

en: You can eat a complete meal, or just go easy with our salad bar.
zh: 您可以享用一顿完整的饭菜，或者只是轻松地享用我们的沙拉吧。

en: The girl in a blue coat is my daughter.
zh: 穿蓝色外套的女孩是我的女儿。

en: I don't want to feel blue.
zh: 我不想感到沮丧。

en: I plan to play a flute solo.
zh: 我计划演奏一首长笛独奏。

en: Do you want another glass of fruit punch?
zh: 你想要再来一杯水果宾治吗？

en: I think that a new fruit drink will go over big during the summer.
zh: 我认为一种新的水果饮料在夏天会很受欢迎。

en: Brutus stabs Caesar, and Caesar falls.
zh: 布鲁图斯刺杀了凯撒，凯撒倒下了。

en: Bruce was terribly upset when his girlfriend left him, but he soon got over it.
zh: 布鲁斯女朋友离开他的时候，他非常难过，但他很快就恢复了。

en: Blue Sky Sport is closed every Thursday.
zh: 蓝天体育用品店每周四都关门。

en: Do you remember what day of the week Blue Sky Sports is closed?
zh: 你还记得蓝天体育用品店星期几关门吗？

en: Here's your pudding.
zh: 这是你的布丁。

en: You look very good in blue.
zh: 你穿蓝色很好看。

en: A prism decomposes light.
zh: 棱镜分解光线。

en: Please replace the empty ink jet cartridge in the printer.
zh: 请更换打印机里空的喷墨墨盒。

en: Is there anywhere I can go to find a flea market?
zh: 有什么地方可以找到跳蚤市场吗？

en: Call us toll-free at 1-800-446-2581.
zh: 请拨打我们的免费电话1-800-446-2581。

en: Age brandy in oak casks.
zh: 在橡木桶中陈酿白兰地。

en: I like my brandy straight.
zh: 我喜欢纯饮白兰地。

en: The brandy brought him around in no time.
zh: 白兰地很快让他恢复了知觉。

en: The brandy is getting to my head.
zh: 白兰地让我有点上头了。

en: They brought her round with brandy.
zh: 他们用白兰地让她苏醒过来。

en: I want to eat French cuisine.
zh: 我想吃法国菜。

en: The President of France visited Okinawa.
zh: 法国总统访问了冲绳。

en: The French are said to love art.
zh: 据说法国人热爱艺术。

en: The French are our neighbors across the Channel.
zh: 法国人是我们在海峡对岸的邻居。

en: I have a daughter who's married to a Frenchman.
zh: 我有一个女儿嫁给了一个法国人。

en: Do you like French wines?
zh: 你喜欢法国葡萄酒吗？

en: I want a person who can speak French.
zh: 我想要一个会说法语的人。

en: To speak French is difficult.
zh: 说法语很难。

en: It comes natural to him to speak French.
zh: 对他来说，说法语是很自然的事情。

en: No one can match her in speaking French.
zh: 在说法语方面，没人能比得上她。

en: Why don't you study French?
zh: 你为什么不学法语？

en: Seeing as she can speak French fluently, she may have studied in France.
zh: 鉴于她能说一口流利的法语，她可能在法国学习过。

en: I picked up some French.
zh: 我学了一些法语。

en: French is difficult to learn.
zh: 法语很难学。

en: She acted as if she knew French well.
zh: 她装作很懂法语的样子。

en: It's not easy to master French at all.
zh: 要精通法语一点都不容易。

en: Such languages as French, Italian and Spanish come from Latin.
zh: 法语、意大利语和西班牙语等语言都源于拉丁语。

en: French is her mother tongue.
zh: 法语是她的母语。

en: I can't even read French, much less speak it.
zh: 我连法语都看不懂，更别说说了。

en: French is spoken by many.
zh: 很多人说法语。

en: French developed from Latin.
zh: 法语是从拉丁语发展而来的。

en: French is spoken in France.
zh: 在法国说法语。

en: French is spoken in parts of Italy as well as in France.
zh: 在意大利的部分地区以及法国也说法语。

en: French is taught by Mr White, not by Miss Green.
zh: 法语是怀特先生教的，不是格林小姐教的。

en: The French word 'chat' means 'cat'.
zh: 法语单词'chat'的意思是'猫'。

en: French has many more vowels than Japanese.
zh: 法语比日语有更多的元音。

en: It's the first time he has encountered people speaking French.
zh: 这是他第一次遇到说法语的人。

en: Written in French, this book is not easy to read.
zh: 这本书是用法语写的，不容易读。

en: Nobody compares with her in French.
zh: 在法语方面，没人能和她相比。

en: I don't speak French very much.
zh: 我不怎么说法语。

en: If only I could speak French.
zh: 要是我会说法语就好了。

en: I was ill at ease because I didn't speak French.
zh: 我感到很不自在，因为我不会说法语。

en: French is their mother tongue.
zh: 法语是他们的母语。

en: For us, English was the language to fall back on when we couldn't make ourselves understood in French.
zh: 对我们来说，当我们无法用法语表达自己的意思时，英语是我们可以依靠的语言。

en: I am writing a study of the French Revolution.
zh: 我正在写一篇关于法国大革命的研究报告。

en: I would like to go to France.
zh: 我想去法国。

en: I'd like to know how to send money to France.
zh: 我想知道怎么寄钱到法国。

en: I hope your business trip to France was successful.
zh: 希望您去法国的商务旅行很成功。

en: France is in western Europe.
zh: 法国位于西欧。

en: France is to the south of England.
zh: 法国位于英国南部。

en: France seems to be swinging left - Britain to the right.
zh: 法国似乎正在向左倾斜——英国向右倾斜。

en: France was at war with Russia.
zh: 法国曾与俄国交战。

en: France is adjacent to Spain.
zh: 法国与西班牙相邻。

en: France borders Italy.
zh: 法国与意大利接壤。

en: France used to have many colonies in Africa.
zh: 法国过去在非洲有很多殖民地。

en: What's the total population of France?
zh: 法国的总人口是多少？

en: I'm not familiar with French poets.
zh: 我不熟悉法国诗人。

en: The French flag is blue, white and red.
zh: 法国国旗是蓝色、白色和红色。

en: Do you have any French wine?
zh: 你们有法国葡萄酒吗？

en: Japan entered into an alliance with France just before the war.
zh: 战争前不久，日本与法国结盟。

en: Artists are highly respected in France.
zh: 艺术家在法国备受尊敬。

en: How do you cook this fish in France?
zh: 在法国，你们怎么烹饪这种鱼？

en: The swing is moving up and down.
zh: 秋千正在上下摆动。

en: Franklin was known for his common sense.
zh: 富兰克林以他的常识而闻名。

en: Frankfurters were first sold in the United States in the 1860s.
zh: 法兰克福香肠于19世纪60年代首次在美国销售。

en: Frank was waiting with pleasure for the date in the evening.
zh: 弗兰克很高兴地等待着晚上的约会。

en: Frank can't have been ill. He was playing tennis all day.
zh: 弗兰克不可能生病了。他一整天都在打网球。

en: Frank majored in sociology at university.
zh: 弗兰克在大学主修社会学。

en: Frank left a message by means of a secret code.
zh: 弗兰克通过秘密代码留下了一条消息。

en: Frank had a reputation as a bad boy but he lived it down as he grew up.
zh: 弗兰克年轻时以坏男孩著称，但他长大后改变了这种形象。

en: Frank's boss is extremely money hungry.
zh: 弗兰克的老板非常贪财。

en: Maybe I'll just wander off on my own.
zh: 也许我会自己到处逛逛。

en: It's time that you stopped wasting your youth on idle pastimes.
zh: 你该停止把青春浪费在无所事事的消遣上了。

en: I've been wandering around.
zh: 我一直在闲逛。

en: As long as we're all just hanging around chatting, may I make a suggestion? Get back to work!
zh: 既然我们都在闲聊，我可以提个建议吗？回去工作吧！

en: Let's just wander and see where it takes us.
zh: 我们随便逛逛，看看会走到哪里。

en: There was only one other person on the platform.
zh: 站台上只有另一个人。

en: There were a good many people on the platform.
zh: 站台上有很多的人。

en: I'd like a Bloody Mary.
zh: 我想要一杯血腥玛丽。

en: Is it all right to use a flash here?
zh: 这里可以用闪光灯吗？

en: Please put me through to Mr Black.
zh: 请帮我接布莱克先生。

en: Is there any likelihood that Mr Black will agree to the plan?
zh: 布莱克先生有可能同意这个计划吗？

en: Blackie makes a lot of noise while he eats.
zh: 布莱奇吃饭的时候声音很大。

en: The brass band marched around the town.
zh: 铜管乐队在镇上游行。

en: The brass band members looked very happy.
zh: 铜管乐队的成员看起来非常高兴。

en: The brass band played three marches.
zh: 铜管乐队演奏了三首进行曲。

en: A plastic glass is better than one made of real glass.
zh: 塑料杯比真正的玻璃杯更好。

en: Plastic does not burn easily.
zh: 塑料不容易燃烧。

en: Plastic does not break easily.
zh: 塑料不容易破碎。

en: A plastic dish will melt on the stove.
zh: 塑料盘子在炉子上会融化。

en: Plastics have taken the place of many conventional materials.
zh: 塑料已经取代了许多传统材料。

en: Brazil supplies the world with coffee beans of quality.
zh: 巴西向世界供应优质咖啡豆。

en: Brazil supplies us with much of our coffee.
zh: 巴西为我们提供了大部分咖啡。

en: People in Brazil were proud of him.
zh: 巴西人为他感到骄傲。

en: The capital of Brazil is Brasilia.
zh: 巴西的首都是巴西利亚。

en: What is the language spoken in Brazil?
zh: 巴西说什么语言？

en: I wonder what language they speak in Brazil.
zh: 我想知道巴西说什么语言。

en: No other sport in Brazil is so popular as soccer.
zh: 在巴西，没有其他运动能像足球那样受欢迎。

en: I would appreciate it if I had the opportunity to meet with Mr Brown again during his stay in Chicago.
zh: 如果我能在布朗先生在芝加哥期间再次与他会面，我将不胜感激。

en: Mrs. Brown understands Japanese.
zh: 布朗夫人懂日语。

en: Mr Brown is in charge of our class.
zh: 布朗先生负责我们的班级。

en: I studied mathematics under Dr. Brown.
zh: 我师从布朗博士学习数学。

en: Mr Brown is looked up to by all the students.
zh: 布朗先生受到所有学生的尊敬。

en: My idea is that we should talk to Mr Brown.
zh: 我的想法是，我们应该和布朗先生谈谈。

en: You should have Mr Brown correct your speech before the presentation.
zh: 你应该让布朗先生在演讲前纠正你的发言稿。

en: I want Mr Brown paged.
zh: 我想让呼叫布朗先生。

en: Mr Brown is in the sunset of his life.
zh: 布朗先生正处于人生的暮年。

en: Mr Brown is jealous of his colleague's success.
zh: 布朗先生嫉妒他同事的成功。

en: Mr Brown was acting in the capacity of ambassador.
zh: 布朗先生当时是以大使的身份行事的。

en: Mr. Brown made his son learn Chinese.
zh: 布朗先生让他的儿子学习中文。

en: Mr Brown belongs to the upper class.
zh: 布朗先生属于上层阶级。

en: Mr Brown is looking for his own glasses.
zh: 布朗先生正在寻找自己的眼镜。

en: Mr Brown is our English teacher.
zh: 布朗先生是我们的英语老师。

en: Mr Brown contracted with the builder for a new house.
zh: 布朗先生与建筑商签订了建造新房的合同。

en: Mr Brown is a doctor.
zh: 布朗先生是一位医生。

en: Mr Brown teaches at Harvard.
zh: 布朗先生在哈佛大学教书。

en: Mr Brown always carries a book with him.
zh: 布朗先生总是随身带着一本书。

en: Mr Brown left for England on May 15.
zh: 布朗先生5月15日动身前往英国。

en: Put me through to Mr Brown.
zh: 请帮我接通布朗先生。

en: I should like to speak to Mr Brown, please.
zh: 我想和布朗先生通话，麻烦您了。

en: We were all surprised at the appointment of Mr Brown as director.
zh: 布朗先生被任命为主任，我们都感到很惊讶。

en: Mr Brown gave me your name.
zh: 布朗先生告诉了我你的名字。

en: Professor Brown is very pleased about getting his book published.
zh: 布朗教授对他的书能够出版感到非常高兴。

en: The Browns were all kind to me.
zh: 布朗一家人都对我很好。

en: Though the Browns have seven children, they seem to make ends meet.
zh: 虽然布朗家有七个孩子，但他们似乎能勉强维持生计。

en: Brown is not so much a writer as a scholar.
zh: 布朗与其说是个作家，不如说是个学者。

en: The girl who Brown married is a nurse.
zh: 布朗娶的那个女孩是个护士。

en: I'd like you to meet Mr Brown.
zh: 我想介绍你认识一下布朗先生。

en: Don't you know Mr. Brown?
zh: 你不认识布朗先生吗？

en: The Browns are a fine and happy family.
zh: 布朗一家是个美好而幸福的家庭。

en: Mr Brown is a wool merchant.
zh: 布朗先生是个羊毛商人。

en: Mr Brown is her father.
zh: 布朗先生是她的父亲。

en: Mr Brown speaks Japanese very well.
zh: 布朗先生日语说得很好。

en: Is Mr Brown a teacher?
zh: 布朗先生是老师吗？

en: Mrs. Brown wrote a book on politics.
zh: 布朗太太写了一本关于政治的书。

en: Ms. Brown seems to be an actress.
zh: 布朗小姐似乎是个演员。

en: Mr Brown is not as old as he looks.
zh: 布朗先生没有他看起来那么老。

en: Mr Brown has a magical way with children.
zh: 布朗先生很会和小孩子相处。

en: Mr Brown is our financial adviser.
zh: 布朗先生是我们的财务顾问。

en: Miss Brown has gotten used to eating Japanese food.
zh: 布朗小姐已经习惯吃日本料理了。

en: Mr Brown was sick at the time.
zh: 布朗先生当时生病了。

en: Please give me the number for Mr Brown.
zh: 请给我布朗先生的电话号码。

en: Mr Brown has four children.
zh: 布朗先生有四个孩子。

en: A Mr Brown wants you on the phone.
zh: 一位布朗先生要和你通电话。

en: It's a phone call from a Mr Brown.
zh: 有个布朗先生打来的电话。

en: I think he is Mr Brown.
zh: 我觉得他是布朗先生。

en: Please unbutton your blouse.
zh: 请解开你的衬衫。

en: Your blouse goes beautifully with that skirt.
zh: 你的衬衫和那条裙子很配。

en: The flyweight champion contended with a strong challenger.
zh: 蝇量级冠军与一位强大的挑战者竞争。

en: Large fries, please.
zh: 请给我大份薯条。

en: Put the meat in the frying pan after the oil has spread.
zh: 油烧开后，把肉放进煎锅里。

en: I'd like to reconfirm my reservation.
zh: 我想再次确认我的预订。

en: Flight reconfirmation, please.
zh: 请帮我确认航班。

en: Brian looks blue.
zh: 布莱恩看起来很沮丧。

en: Brian regrets starting a relationship with her and wants to escape from her.
zh: 布莱恩后悔和她开始恋爱，想摆脱她。

en: Brian came to Kate, with his hair wet.
zh: 布莱恩头发湿漉漉地来找凯特。

en: Brian left his belongings behind.
zh: 布莱恩把他的东西落下了。

en: Brian intends to strictly limit the money he uses.
zh: 布莱恩打算严格限制他使用的钱。

en: Brian lives over the hill.
zh: 布莱恩住在山的那边。

en: Brian took some roses.
zh: 布莱恩拿了一些玫瑰花。

en: Brian left for New York.
zh: 布莱恩动身去纽约了。

en: Brian left the door open.
zh: 布莱恩走的时候门没关。

en: Brian kept the door open.
zh: 布莱恩一直让门开着。

en: Brian studied English for this trip.
zh: 布莱恩为了这次旅行学习了英语。

en: Brian kept Kate waiting.
zh: 布莱恩让凯特等了很久。

en: Brian went to school with Kate.
zh: 布莱恩和凯特一起上学。

en: Brian bought a lipstick for Kate.
zh: 布莱恩给凯特买了一支口红。

en: Brian gets his mother to do his homework.
zh: 布莱恩让他妈妈帮他做作业。

en: Brian barely has enough money so he consulted his parents.
zh: 布莱恩几乎没有足够的钱，所以他咨询了他的父母。

en: There is a shortage of money in Brian's wallet and bank account.
zh: 布莱恩的钱包和银行账户里都缺钱。

en: Brian's girlfriend often begs him to take her to luxurious restaurants.
zh: 布莱恩的女朋友经常求他带她去豪华餐厅。

en: To Brian's surprise, his debt amounted to a considerable sum.
zh: 令布莱恩惊讶的是，他的债务总额相当可观。

en: Brian is holding Kate's hands.
zh: 布莱恩正握着凯特的手。

en: It took Brian several hours to write a card.
zh: 布莱恩花了几个小时才写完一张卡片。

en: This is Brian Rock.
zh: 这是布莱恩·洛克。

en: Ha - this work finished! Let's go to next stage!
zh: 哈，这项工作完成了！让我们进入下一个阶段！

en: I met him on the street by chance.
zh: 我在街上偶然遇见了他。

en: Becoming too fat is not good for one's health.
zh: 变得太胖对健康不利。

en: Chance led to the discovery of the new island.
zh: 偶然的机会导致了新岛屿的发现。

en: The rumor turned out to be false.
zh: 谣言原来是假的。

en: Give me a bottle of wine.
zh: 给我一瓶酒。

en: Wine is not to my taste.
zh: 我不喜欢酒的味道。

en: The taste of wine is largely dependent upon the weather.
zh: 葡萄酒的味道很大程度上取决于天气。

en: You should not adulterate wine with water.
zh: 你不应该在酒里掺水。

en: He says he can't go without wine even for a day.
zh: 他说他一天都离不开酒。

en: They have no more wine.
zh: 他们没有酒了。

en: Grapes grow in bunches.
zh: 葡萄成串生长。

en: I like grapes, but I can't eat so many.
zh: 我喜欢葡萄，但我不能吃这么多。

en: We make grapes into wine.
zh: 我们用葡萄酿酒。

en: Grapes are made into wine.
zh: 葡萄被用来酿酒。

en: The grapes are getting mature.
zh: 葡萄快成熟了。

en: The proof of the pudding is in the eating.
zh: 布丁好不好，吃了才知道。

en: I'll punch your lights out!
zh: 我要揍你一顿！

en: He grunted his thanks.
zh: 他咕哝着表示感谢。

en: Football is an old game.
zh: 足球是一项古老的运动。

en: Football is my favorite game.
zh: 足球是我最喜欢的运动。

en: Football was played in China in the second century.
zh: 足球在公元二世纪的中国就有人玩了。

en: The football game might be called off on account of rain.
zh: 足球比赛可能会因为下雨而取消。

en: Where can I see a football game?
zh: 我在哪里可以看足球比赛？

en: The football game was postponed on account of bad weather.
zh: 足球比赛因为天气不好而延期了。

en: Did you get hurt in the football game?
zh: 你在足球比赛中受伤了吗？

en: In a football game the spectators are usually ardent rooters for one of the two teams, but there also is a small group who will climb on the bandwagon of the winning team.
zh: 在足球比赛中，观众通常是两支球队中一支球队的狂热支持者，但也有少数人会加入获胜球队的行列。

en: The football game is now on the air.
zh: 足球比赛现在正在直播。

en: I play center in football and basketball.
zh: 我在足球和篮球比赛中打中锋。

en: A football team consists of eleven players.
zh: 一个足球队由十一名队员组成。

en: Sorry to be so direct, but how much did you pay for this?
zh: 很抱歉这么直接，但你花了多少钱买这个？

en: President Bush gave an important address on TV and the radio yesterday.
zh: 布什总统昨天在电视和广播上发表了重要讲话。

en: Mrs. Bush is our English teacher.
zh: 布什夫人是我们的英语老师。

en: I have push button phones.
zh: 我有按键电话。

en: Bush followed Reagan as president.
zh: 布什在里根之后担任总统。

en: Even after it was hit, the pole was still upright.
zh: 即使被击中，那根杆子仍然是直立的。

en: The date and address is usually written at the head of letters.
zh: 日期和地址通常写在信件的开头。

en: There is no cure for the common cold.
zh: 普通感冒没有治愈方法。

en: I usually play tennis.
zh: 我通常打网球。

en: One of the twins is alive, but the other is dead.
zh: 双胞胎中的一个还活着，但另一个已经死了。

en: My ears were ringing from being beaten.
zh: 我被打得耳朵嗡嗡作响。

en: They were to have got married in May.
zh: 他们原定于五月结婚。

en: The older of the two daughters is in college.
zh: 两个女儿中年龄较大的那个在上大学。

en: Hey, we're trying to have a serious discussion here so I'd appreciate it if you wouldn't butt in so irresponsibly.
zh: 嘿，我们正在进行严肃的讨论，所以如果你不要这么不负责任地插嘴，我会很感激的。

en: Pigs share certain characteristics with human beings.
zh: 猪和人类有一些共同的特征。

en: Mr Fujimori is famous all over the world.
zh: 藤森先生在世界各地都很有名。

en: He had a lot of straight, silvery hair.
zh: 他有很多笔直的银色头发。

en: Please push the buzzer.
zh: 请按蜂鸣器。

en: The buzzer sounded.
zh: 蜂鸣器响了。

en: An owl sleeps by day and hunts by night.
zh: 猫头鹰白天睡觉，晚上捕猎。

en: Owls cannot see in the daytime.
zh: 猫头鹰白天看不见东西。

en: The owl can see in the dark.
zh: 猫头鹰在黑暗中能看见东西。

en: Owls are supposed to be very wise.
zh: 人们认为猫头鹰非常聪明。

en: Quit pouting. Smile and cheer up.
zh: 别撅嘴了。笑一笑，振作起来。

en: The owl is slow on foot.
zh: 猫头鹰在陆地上行动缓慢。

en: The forward kicked a goal.
zh: 前锋踢进了一个球。

en: Blowfish is a delicacy in Japan.
zh: 河豚是日本的一道美味佳肴。

en: Fox missed a chance to be a movie star.
zh: 福克斯错失了成为电影明星的机会。

en: Do we dress formal?
zh: 我们需要穿正式服装吗？

en: I'll buy a Ford.
zh: 我要买一辆福特汽车。

en: Mr Ford is all right now.
zh: 福特先生现在没事了。

en: Mr Ford is what is called a self-made man.
zh: 福特先生是一个白手起家的人。

en: I forgot to call up Mr Ford.
zh: 我忘了给福特先生打电话。

en: Mr Ford owns this land.
zh: 福特先生拥有这片土地。

en: Fortune 500 companies were the hardest hit by recent legislation.
zh: 《财富》500强公司是近期立法中受冲击最严重的。

en: Fork-users have historically been in the minority.
zh: 历史上，使用叉子的人一直占少数。

en: Fork-users are mainly in Europe, North America, and Latin America; chopstick-users in eastern Asia and finger-users in Africa, the Middle East, Indonesia, and India.
zh: 使用叉子的人主要在欧洲、北美和拉丁美洲；使用筷子的人在东亚；使用手指的人在非洲、中东、印度尼西亚和印度。

en: Could we have a fork?
zh: 我们可以要一个叉子吗？

en: Those who use forks or chopsticks often think people who don't are uncivilized.
zh: 那些使用叉子或筷子的人常常认为不用的人是不文明的。

en: Forks and chopsticks became popular because they could easily handle hot food.
zh: 叉子和筷子变得流行是因为它们可以轻松处理热的食物。

en: Before forks and chopsticks, people usually ate food with a piece of flat bread.
zh: 在叉子和筷子出现之前，人们通常用一块扁平面包来吃东西。

en: Although the fork entered society on the tables of rich people, many members of royalty, such as Elizabeth I of England and Louis XIV of France, ate with their fingers.
zh: 虽然叉子最初在上流社会富人的餐桌上出现，但许多皇室成员，如英国的伊丽莎白一世和法国的路易十四，都用手抓食物吃。

en: Forks were used for many years in Europe and the Near East, but only for cooking.
zh: 叉子在欧洲和近东地区使用了多年，但仅用于烹饪。

en: The general use of forks for eating started in the tenth century A.D.
zh: 叉子普遍用于进餐始于公元十世纪。

en: A fork fell off the table.
zh: 一个叉子从桌子上掉了下来。

en: I can't use a fork well.
zh: 我不太会用叉子。

en: There is a fork missing.
zh: 少了一个叉子。

en: The work of Feuerbach is frequently referred to.
zh: 人们经常提到费尔巴哈的著作。

en: Locate Puerto Rico on a map.
zh: 在地图上找到波多黎各。

en: The ferry started to move and we were across in half an hour.
zh: 渡轮开始移动，半小时后我们就到达了对岸。

en: There were not more than one hundred passengers on board the ferry.
zh: 渡轮上乘客不超过一百人。

en: Phoenix is the capital of Arizona.
zh: 菲尼克斯是亚利桑那州的首府。

en: It's the Fairmont bus.
zh: 那是费尔蒙特巴士。

en: I swam two pool lengths.
zh: 我游了两个泳池的长度。

en: The girl swimming in the pool is my cousin.
zh: 在游泳池里游泳的那个女孩是我的表妹。

en: While swimming in the pool, she lost her locker key.
zh: 在游泳池里游泳时，她把储物柜的钥匙弄丢了。

en: The boomerang hurtled whistling through the air.
zh: 回旋镖呼啸着飞过空中。

en: The boom has peaked out.
zh: 繁荣已经达到顶峰。

en: Stop your grumbling and get the work out of the way.
zh: 别再抱怨了，快把工作做完。

en: I would like to purchase some boots.
zh: 我想买几双靴子。

en: Ms. Mizuta likes that "Buska" character so much that last time she happened by a store that had Buska goods, she homed in on them and bought one on the spot.
zh: 水田女士非常喜欢“布斯卡”这个角色，上次她偶然路过一家有布斯卡商品的商店，她立刻被吸引住了，当场买了一个。

en: What's the capital city of Finland?
zh: 芬兰的首都是哪里？

en: My film has run out.
zh: 我的胶卷用完了。

en: Philip and Tom are related to each other.
zh: 菲利普和汤姆是亲戚。

en: Mr Philips, along with some friends and neighbors, is planning a celebration.
zh: 菲利普斯先生和一些朋友和邻居正在计划一个庆祝活动。

en: The bellows are not working.
zh: 风箱坏了。

en: On encountering the celebrity, the fans asked for his autograph.
zh: 遇到那位名人时，粉丝们要求他签名。

en: The fans sought to shake the actress's hand.
zh: 粉丝们想和那位女演员握手。

en: I thoroughly enjoyed myself at the Van Dorgen Exhibition.
zh: 我非常喜欢范多根展览。

en: She's intent on going to New York to study fashion.
zh: 她一心想去纽约学习时装。

en: A fashion model must have a good carriage.
zh: 时装模特必须有良好的仪态。

en: Fashion designers are breaking with tradition.
zh: 时装设计师正在打破传统。

en: What did the businessman say when he invented the zip-fastener?
zh: 那位商人发明拉链时说了什么？

en: Dr. Faust was well versed in alchemy.
zh: 浮士德博士精通炼金术。

en: Please don't encrypt your file.
zh: 请不要加密你的文件。

en: I'm attaching three files.
zh: 我正在附加三个文件。

en: The file cabinet drawers are open.
zh: 文件柜的抽屉是打开的。

en: Don't give up the fight.
zh: 不要放弃战斗。

en: Fabre wrote books about insects.
zh: 法布尔写了关于昆虫的书。

en: Please excuse me for calling you by your first name.
zh: 请原谅我直呼你的名字。

en: I'd like to travel first-class.
zh: 我想乘坐头等舱。

en: The first baseman is the Achilles heel of our team.
zh: 一垒手是我们队的阿喀琉斯之踵。

en: The cold air revived Tom.
zh: 冷空气使汤姆精神焕发。

en: Ping-Pong is also called table tennis.
zh: 乒乓球也叫桌球。

en: Do you like baseball, Bin?
zh: 斌，你喜欢棒球吗？

en: Bin lived in Singapore.
zh: 斌住在新加坡。

en: You could have heard a pin drop.
zh: 你都能听到针掉在地上的声音。

en: There was a little water left in the bottom of the bottle.
zh: 瓶底还剩一点水。

en: There is a little water in the bottle.
zh: 瓶子里有一点水。

en: There is no water left in the bottle.
zh: 瓶子里没有水了。

en: There is a little milk left in the bottle.
zh: 瓶子里还剩一点牛奶。

en: There is little wine left in the bottle.
zh: 瓶子里几乎没有酒了。

en: There is little milk left in the bottle.
zh: 瓶子里还剩一点牛奶。

en: Do I have to focus it?
zh: 我需要对焦吗？

en: Please just focus it.
zh: 请对焦一下。

en: That's a little out of focus.
zh: 有点失焦。

en: The Hindus worship in temples.
zh: 印度教徒在寺庙里做礼拜。

en: We ordered pink, but we received blue.
zh: 我们订的是粉色，但我们收到的是蓝色。

en: Who is the girl in the pink dress?
zh: 那个穿粉色裙子的女孩是谁？

en: Pink and rose are similar colors.
zh: 粉色和玫瑰色是相似的颜色。

en: It was a big upset when Hingis was eliminated in the first round.
zh: 辛吉斯在第一轮就被淘汰，真是个大冷门。

en: The pin pierced his finger and it began to bleed.
zh: 别针扎了他的手指，开始流血了。

en: It is a sin to steal even a pin.
zh: 即使偷一根针也是一种罪过。

en: Hiromi decided to risk bungee-jumping, even though he was scared.
zh: 尽管弘美很害怕，但他还是决定冒险蹦极。

en: Hiromi wears a new dress.
zh: 弘美穿了一件新连衣裙。

en: Hiroshi is sawing the wood into boards.
zh: 弘志正在把木头锯成板子。

en: Although Hiroko dislikes cigarette smoke, she readily goes out drinking with friends.
zh: 尽管弘子不喜欢香烟的味道，但她还是经常和朋友出去喝酒。

en: Except for Bill, they were all in time.
zh: 除了比尔，他们都准时到了。

en: Except for Bill, they all made it.
zh: 除了比尔，他们都成功了。

en: May I speak to Bill?
zh: 我可以和比尔说话吗？

en: I'd like to take the pill.
zh: 我想吃药。

en: Both Bill and Mac are crazy about computers.
zh: 比尔和麦克都对电脑着迷。

en: Bill is skillful in arguing and debating.
zh: 比尔擅长争论和辩论。

en: Bill put aside a hundred dollars for his trip.
zh: 比尔为他的旅行存了一百美元。

en: Bill will return next week.
zh: 比尔下周回来。

en: Bill has the makings of an excellent scientist.
zh: 比尔具备成为一名优秀科学家的素质。

en: Bill often fails to keep his word.
zh: 比尔经常不守信用。

en: Bill missed the first ball.
zh: 比尔没击中第一个球。

en: Bill is a baseball player.
zh: 比尔是一名棒球运动员。

en: Bill really drinks like a fish.
zh: 比尔真能喝，像条鱼一样。

en: Bill didn't work hard enough and so he failed.
zh: 比尔不够努力，所以他失败了。

en: Bill is on the editorial staff.
zh: 比尔在编辑部工作。

en: Bill was unable to get Mary to understand what he said.
zh: 比尔没能让玛丽理解他所说的话。

en: Bill hates his father smoking heavily.
zh: 比尔讨厌他父亲抽烟很凶。

en: Bill resembles his father in character.
zh: 比尔的性格像他的父亲。

en: Unfair advantage was taken of Bill's weakness.
zh: 比尔的弱点被人占了便宜。

en: Bill never fails to send a birthday present to his mother.
zh: 比尔总是记得给他的母亲寄生日礼物。

en: Bill is completely unlike his brother.
zh: 比尔和他哥哥完全不一样。

en: Bill can speak Japanese a little.
zh: 比尔会说一点日语。

en: Bill was in Japan.
zh: 比尔去过日本。

en: Bill dealt Tom a sudden blow.
zh: 比尔突然打了汤姆一下。

en: Bill has a lot of original ideas.
zh: 比尔有很多独创性的想法。

en: Bill got mad and called Dick names.
zh: 比尔生气了，骂了迪克。

en: Bill dived into the river to save the drowning child.
zh: 比尔跳进河里救那个溺水的孩子。

en: Bill took his brother to the zoo.
zh: 比尔带他弟弟去了动物园。

en: Bill is really fighting the battle of the bulge.
zh: 比尔真是在努力减肥。

en: Bill was canned from his job last week.
zh: 比尔上周被解雇了。

en: Bill was single until he tied the knot last week.
zh: 比尔上周结婚前一直是单身。

en: Bill was adamant that she should obey him.
zh: 比尔坚决要求她服从他。

en: Bill is good at mathematics.
zh: 比尔擅长数学。

en: Bill was killed by an intruder.
zh: 比尔被一个入侵者杀害了。

en: Bill had always been a quiet, home-loving man, but after a few months in the job, his personality changed.
zh: 比尔一直是个安静、恋家的人，但工作了几个月后，他的性格变了。

en: Bill did nothing else but joke.
zh: 比尔除了开玩笑什么也不做。

en: Bill has not less than six dollars.
zh: 比尔至少有六美元。

en: Bill was killed with a gun.
zh: 比尔被枪杀。

en: Bill will win, won't he?
zh: 比尔会赢的，不是吗？

en: Bill wanted to get to the office in good time to clean his desk.
zh: 比尔想及时赶到办公室，把他的桌子打扫干净。

en: Bill was too young to take the post.
zh: 比尔太年轻，不能胜任这个职位。

en: Bill has a part-time job so that he can buy a car.
zh: 比尔有一份兼职工作，这样他就可以买一辆车。

en: Bill died a disappointed man.
zh: 比尔带着失望去世了。

en: Bill shouted that he was all right.
zh: 比尔喊道他没事。

en: Bill can ride a bicycle.
zh: 比尔会骑自行车。

en: Bill is seldom ever on time.
zh: 比尔很少准时。

en: Bill is nervous about the exam.
zh: 比尔对考试感到紧张。

en: Bill was able to pass the exam.
zh: 比尔能够通过考试。

en: Bill is two years older than I.
zh: 比尔比我大两岁。

en: Bill is two years senior to me.
zh: 比尔比我年长两岁。

en: Bill is my junior by two years.
zh: 比尔比我小两岁。

en: Bill accepted my statement as true.
zh: 比尔认为我的陈述是真实的。

en: Bill tapped me on the shoulder.
zh: 比尔拍了拍我的肩膀。

en: Bill is my best friend.
zh: 比尔是我最好的朋友。

en: Bill brought me a glass of water.
zh: 比尔给我端来一杯水。

en: Bill brought me the book.
zh: 比尔把书给我带来了。

en: Bill made me a nice dress.
zh: 比尔给我做了一件漂亮的连衣裙。

en: Bill joined our company three years ago.
zh: 比尔三年前加入了我们公司。

en: Bill is a great fighter.
zh: 比尔是个很棒的斗士。

en: It looks like Bill will go to medical school after all.
zh: 看来比尔最终还是会去医学院。

en: Bill never argues with other people.
zh: 比尔从不和别人争吵。

en: Bill is not tall like you.
zh: 比尔不像你那么高。

en: Bill boasts of owning the biggest car in the neighborhood.
zh: 比尔吹嘘自己拥有附近最大的汽车。

en: Bill spoke Japanese with surprising fluency.
zh: 比尔说日语非常流利，令人惊讶。

en: Bill came to see me last autumn.
zh: 比尔去年秋天来看我。

en: Bill may be watching this game at the stadium.
zh: 比尔可能正在体育场观看这场比赛。

en: Bill was much loved by the other children in his school.
zh: 比尔深受学校里其他孩子的喜爱。

en: Bill lives near the sea.
zh: 比尔住在海边附近。

en: Bill kept on crying for hours.
zh: 比尔不停地哭了几个小时。

en: Bill got into such a hole with the payments on his house that now that he's lost his job, I don't know how he'll ever get out from under.
zh: 比尔的房贷已经欠了很多，现在他又失业了，我不知道他该如何摆脱困境。

en: Above all, Bill was worried about gaining weight.
zh: 最重要的是，比尔担心体重增加。

en: The printing business made Bill a small fortune.
zh: 印刷生意让比尔发了一小笔财。

en: Bill got up early in order that he might catch the first train.
zh: 比尔早起是为了赶上第一班火车。

en: Every other day Bill goes fishing.
zh: 比尔每隔一天就去钓鱼。

en: Bill often plays with toys by himself.
zh: 比尔经常自己玩玩具。

en: Bill is a regular fool.
zh: 比尔是个十足的傻瓜。

en: Bill often goes to the park.
zh: 比尔经常去公园。

en: Bill is not as tall as Bob.
zh: 比尔没有鲍勃高。

en: Bill can run faster than Bob.
zh: 比尔比鲍勃跑得快。

en: Bill is on his way to New York.
zh: 比尔正在去纽约的路上。

en: Bill was crazy for a motorbike.
zh: 比尔非常想要一辆摩托车。

en: Bill came all the way from Florida.
zh: 比尔从佛罗里达州一路赶来。

en: Bill seems to be stuck on Mary.
zh: 比尔似乎迷上了玛丽。

en: Bill got up so early that he caught the first train.
zh: 比尔起得很早，赶上了第一班火车。

en: Why did Bill tear the letter into pieces?
zh: 比尔为什么把信撕成碎片？

en: How fast Bill runs!
zh: 比尔跑得真快！

en: Bill will often sing in the toilet.
zh: 比尔经常在厕所里唱歌。

en: Bill turned on the television.
zh: 比尔打开了电视。

en: Bill stopped smoking.
zh: 比尔戒烟了。

en: Bill just wanted to comfort Monica, but she interpreted it as romantic interest.
zh: 比尔只是想安慰莫妮卡，但她却误解为浪漫的兴趣。

en: Bill was killed by that man.
zh: 比尔被那个人杀害了。

en: Bill signed up for the exam.
zh: 比尔报名参加了考试。

en: Bill did not commit the crime.
zh: 比尔没有犯下罪行。

en: Bill is equal to the task of running the firm.
zh: 比尔能够胜任管理公司的任务。

en: Bill didn't turn up at the party.
zh: 比尔没有出现在聚会上。

en: Bill replaced Jim as captain.
zh: 比尔取代吉姆成为队长。

en: Bill is still a legendary figure in this company.
zh: 比尔仍然是这家公司的传奇人物。

en: Bill disagreed with his classmates on every subject.
zh: 比尔在每个问题上都与他的同学意见不一致。

en: Bill can run fastest in his class.
zh: 比尔在他班上跑得最快。

en: Bill is honest all the time.
zh: 比尔一直都很诚实。

en: Bill was late for school as usual.
zh: 比尔像往常一样上学迟到了。

en: Bill has stock in that company.
zh: 比尔拥有那家公司的股份。

en: Bill climbed the ladder of success until he became the president of the company.
zh: 比尔攀登成功的阶梯，直到他成为公司的总裁。

en: Bill is the more clever of the two brothers.
zh: 比尔是兄弟俩中比较聪明的一个。

en: Bill is 20 minutes late. He must have gotten lost somewhere.
zh: 比尔迟到了20分钟。他一定是在某个地方迷路了。

en: Bill has come by a great deal of money.
zh: 比尔得到了一大笔钱。

en: Bill is as tall as Jack.
zh: 比尔和杰克一样高。

en: Do you know what to do if there's a fire in the building?
zh: 你知道如果大楼里发生火灾该怎么办吗？

en: There is a car in front of the building.
zh: 建筑物前面有一辆车。

en: Bill's work is selling cars.
zh: 比尔的工作是卖汽车。

en: Bill's abrupt manner causes him to be misunderstood.
zh: 比尔生硬的态度导致他被人误解。

en: Let's call Bill up.
zh: 我们给比尔打个电话吧。

en: Bill has no sense of adventure.
zh: 比尔缺乏冒险精神。

en: I haven't seen Bill for a long time.
zh: 我很久没见到比尔了。

en: Bill has many friends.
zh: 比尔有很多朋友。

en: I never can tell Bill from his brother.
zh: 我总是分不清比尔和他哥哥。

en: Bill and I have been sincere friends for a long time.
zh: 我和比尔一直是真诚的朋友。

en: When Mr Hilton wanted to sell his house, he advertised it in the newspaper.
zh: 当希尔顿先生想卖掉他的房子时，他在报纸上登了广告。

en: How much is the fare to the Hilton Hotel?
zh: 到希尔顿酒店的车费是多少？

en: The Hilton Hotel, please.
zh: 请到希尔顿酒店。

en: Bill and John like to get together once a month to shoot the breeze.
zh: 比尔和约翰喜欢每月聚一次闲聊。

en: Bill and Joan divided the candy between them.
zh: 比尔和琼把糖果分了。

en: Not only Bill but also Mac is crazy about computers.
zh: 不仅比尔，而且麦克也对电脑着迷。

en: Mr Hill went on a journey to Japan yesterday.
zh: 希尔先生昨天去了日本旅行。

en: I'm planning to stay at the Hillside Hotel.
zh: 我计划住在山坡酒店。

en: It is doubtful whether Bill will come.
zh: 比尔是否会来，这很难说。

en: Bill was singled out for a special award.
zh: 比尔被选出来获得特别奖励。

en: The building replaced several houses.
zh: 这座建筑物取代了几栋房子。

en: Bill called me last night.
zh: 比尔昨晚给我打了电话。

en: Bill won the match, not so much by good luck as by real ability.
zh: 比尔赢得比赛，与其说是靠运气，不如说是靠真正的实力。

en: Nobody knows where Bill has gone.
zh: 没人知道比尔去哪儿了。

en: Bill will take you on at tennis.
zh: 比尔会和你比赛网球。

en: After fifteen years at a building firm, Bill Pearson was given the responsible position of area manager.
zh: 在一家建筑公司工作了十五年后，比尔·皮尔逊被授予了区域经理的重要职位。

en: Bill, call me tonight.
zh: 比尔，今晚给我打电话。

en: Bill, answer the door.
zh: 比尔，去开门。

en: Bill, did you take Spot for a walk yet?
zh: 比尔，你带斯波特去散步了吗？

en: Philip, like Andrew and Peter, was from the town of Bethesda.
zh: 菲利普和安德鲁、彼得一样，来自伯赛大镇。

en: "Come and see", said Philip.
zh: “你来看吧”，菲利普说。

en: Billy is very tall for his age.
zh: 比利对于他的年龄来说非常高。

en: Bill was careless in handling his pistol.
zh: 比尔在摆弄手枪时很粗心。

en: Billy is good at sports.
zh: 比利擅长运动。

en: The secret of the pyramid was brought to light by science.
zh: 金字塔的秘密被科学揭示。

en: The pyramids were built in ancient times.
zh: 金字塔建于古代。

en: It looks like cherry blossom-viewing season is at an end. You can see the petals fluttering down.
zh: 看来赏樱的季节要结束了。你可以看到花瓣纷纷飘落。

en: See which way the cat jumps.
zh: 看看猫会怎么做。

en: Perhaps it will rain tomorrow.
zh: 也许明天会下雨。

en: She might be seriously ill.
zh: 她可能病得很重。

en: She might not know that we are here.
zh: 她可能不知道我们在这里。

en: He cannot possibly believe her.
zh: 他不可能相信她。

en: Perhaps he will come.
zh: 也许他会来。

en: He might be away at the moment.
zh: 他现在可能不在。

en: John might know something about Mr Black.
zh: 约翰可能知道一些关于布莱克先生的事情。

en: Do you have an extra English dictionary by any chance?
zh: 你有没有多余的英语词典？

en: She might know the answer.
zh: 她可能知道答案。

en: Do you mean you met her!?
zh: 你是说你见过她！？

en: Should anyone call on me in my absence, tell him that I will be back soon.
zh: 如果我不在的时候有人来找我，告诉他我很快就回来。

en: Did you happen to see her yesterday?
zh: 你昨天碰巧见到她了吗？

en: Do you, by any chance, think you will succeed?
zh: 你有没有可能认为你会成功？

en: Do you happen to know a man by the name of Brown?
zh: 你碰巧认识一个叫布朗的人吗？

en: Do you happen to know of a cheap hotel near here?
zh: 你碰巧知道附近有什么便宜的旅馆吗？

en: Do you know Professor Brown by any chance?
zh: 你碰巧认识布朗教授吗？

en: Something might have happened to her.
zh: 她可能出事了。

en: He might have lost his way.
zh: 他可能迷路了。

en: Possibly he knows who broke the windows.
zh: 可能他知道是谁打破了窗户。

en: The chances are that he has not heard the news yet.
zh: 他很可能还没有听到这个消息。

en: It occurred to me that he might be an industrial spy.
zh: 我突然想到他可能是个商业间谍。

en: I may win by some chance.
zh: 我可能会侥幸获胜。

en: It might rain. We'd better take an umbrella.
zh: 可能会下雨。我们最好带把伞。

en: Do you happen to know anything done by her alone?
zh: 你碰巧知道任何她独自完成的事情吗？

en: The hail cracked the window.
zh: 冰雹把窗户打裂了。

en: The hail harmed the crops.
zh: 冰雹损害了庄稼。

en: The buffet or the cafeteria is in Car 9.
zh: 自助餐或自助餐厅在9号车厢。

en: Mrs. Hughes, this is Peter Brown.
zh: 休斯夫人，这位是彼得·布朗。

en: A fuse has blown.
zh: 保险丝烧断了。

en: Pull the string and the water flushes.
zh: 拉一下绳子，水就冲出来了。

en: A good appetite is a good sauce.
zh: 好胃口就是好调料。

en: The mountains in the Himalayas are higher than those in the Andes.
zh: 喜马拉雅山的山脉比安第斯山脉的山脉更高。

en: I really enjoyed the beefsteak you served, not to mention the other dishes.
zh: 我真的很喜欢你做的牛排，更不用说其他的菜了。

en: Keeping up with the Joneses is expensive in rich town like Beverly Hills.
zh: 在像比佛利山庄这样的富人区，与邻居攀比是很昂贵的。

en: Could I have a plastic bag for those?
zh: 能给我一个塑料袋装这些东西吗？

en: The weakness of vinyl is that it is easily affected by heat.
zh: 乙烯基的缺点是容易受热影响。

en: I grow tomatoes in plastic houses.
zh: 我在塑料大棚里种西红柿。

en: Don't count your chickens.
zh: 别打如意算盘。

en: I like hot springs off the beaten track.
zh: 我喜欢人迹罕至的温泉。

en: I felt so good as I lazed in the sunshine that I drifted off to sleep.
zh: 我懒洋洋地躺在阳光下，感觉太舒服了，不知不觉就睡着了。

en: Cover your head when you are in the sun.
zh: 在阳光下要遮住你的头。

en: Even though I was sitting in the sun, I still felt chilly.
zh: 即使我坐在阳光下，仍然感到冷。

en: I'm going to rock the boat.
zh: 我打算打破常规。

en: Let's take a coffee break, shall we?
zh: 我们休息一下喝杯咖啡吧，好吗？

en: It looks as if it is going to rain.
zh: 看起来好像要下雨了。

en: How do you like living on your own?
zh: 你觉得一个人住怎么样？

en: Being left alone, the boy didn't know what to do.
zh: 男孩独自一人，不知道该做什么。

en: Left to himself, the child would feel very lonely.
zh: 如果让孩子独自一人，他会感到非常孤独。

en: One speaks English, and the other speaks Japanese.
zh: 一个说英语，另一个说日语。

en: A man may be wrong; so may a generation.
zh: 一个人可能会犯错；一个时代也可能会犯错。

en: A boy was driving a flock of sheep.
zh: 一个男孩正在赶一群羊。

en: A woman fell from a ship into the sea.
zh: 一个女人从船上掉进了海里。

en: A girl stood there crying.
zh: 一个女孩站在那里哭泣。

en: A high school student made this robot.
zh: 一个高中生制作了这个机器人。

en: A policeman ran past.
zh: 一个警察跑过去了。

en: I always think of him when I'm alone.
zh: 我总是在我一个人的时候想起他。

en: You should have told me that you wanted me to come alone.
zh: 你应该告诉我你想让我单独来。

en: Don't be a wallflower.
zh: 不要当壁花。

en: You must go to a foreign country for yourself.
zh: 你必须亲自去国外看看。

en: Unable to accomplish the task by himself, he turned to me for help.
zh: 他自己无法完成任务，所以向我寻求帮助。

en: Hitler is one of the most notorious dictators.
zh: 希特勒是最臭名昭著的独裁者之一。

en: Hitler led Germany into war.
zh: 希特勒带领德国发动了战争。

en: Hitler invaded Poland in 1939.
zh: 希特勒于1939年入侵波兰。

en: Hitler assumed power in 1933.
zh: 希特勒于1933年上台执政。

en: Hitomi looked very happy.
zh: 瞳看起来非常高兴。

en: Jack stood aside for Hitomi to enter.
zh: 杰克让到一边让瞳进去。

en: The explanation of each fact took a long time.
zh: 对每个事实的解释都花费了很长时间。

en: One magazine is for boys, and another for girls.
zh: 一本杂志是给男孩看的，另一本是给女孩看的。

en: Many a quarrel comes about through a misunderstanding.
zh: 许多争吵都是由于误解引起的。

en: There wasn't a soul in sight.
zh: 视线范围内一个人也没有。

en: I was wondering if you could help me.
zh: 我想知道你是否能帮我。

en: Could I ask a favor of you?
zh: 我可以请你帮个忙吗？

en: May I ask you a favor?
zh: 我可以请你帮个忙吗？

en: I have an idea.
zh: 我有个主意。

en: Once you hesitate, you are lost.
zh: 一旦你犹豫，你就完了。

en: A tear rolled down her cheek.
zh: 一滴眼泪从她的脸颊上滚落下来。

en: That last comment was pushing it.
zh: 刚才那句话有点过分了。

en: In a word, he is a flatterer.
zh: 总而言之，他是个马屁精。

en: She had changed so much that I couldn't recognize her.
zh: 她变化太大了，我认不出她了。

en: My head aches so much.
zh: 我头疼得厉害。

en: It hurts terribly.
zh: 疼得厉害。

en: I have a bad toothache.
zh: 我牙疼得很厉害。

en: It was very cold, and then before long, on top of that, it began to rain.
zh: 天气很冷，没过多久，更糟糕的是，开始下雨了。

en: It's terribly cold. I think I'm going to catch a cold.
zh: 太冷了。我想我要感冒了。

en: I've been badly bitten by mosquitoes.
zh: 我被蚊子咬得很惨。

en: It was so dark that they could hardly see.
zh: 天太黑了，他们几乎看不见。

en: It was a terrible confusion; Sue slipped later in the water. They're all mad at you.
zh: 当时一片混乱；苏后来在水里滑倒了。他们都对你很生气。

en: A piece of bread was not enough to satisfy his hunger.
zh: 一块面包不足以满足他的饥饿。

en: The trip was canceled because of the terrible storm.
zh: 因为糟糕的暴风雨，旅行取消了。

en: I had a hard time.
zh: 我过得很艰难。

en: He could not go out because of a bad storm.
zh: 因为恶劣的暴风雨，他不能出门。

en: I had a devil of a time.
zh: 我吃尽了苦头。

en: You'll have a hard time.
zh: 你会遇到困难的。

en: Hearing the terrible noise, I asked him what was going on.
zh: 听到可怕的噪音，我问他发生了什么事。

en: I had a bad stomach-ache.
zh: 我肚子疼得很厉害。

en: A bad cold has kept me from studying this week.
zh: 这周我因为重感冒没能学习。

en: I've caught a terrible cold.
zh: 我得了重感冒。

en: I'll consult a doctor as I have a bad cold.
zh: 我得了重感冒，所以要去看医生。

en: I had a bad cold.
zh: 我得了重感冒。

en: Having a bad cold, he was absent from school today.
zh: 因为得了重感冒，他今天没来上学。

en: Owing to a bad cold, he could not take part in the game.
zh: 由于得了重感冒，他没能参加比赛。

en: He said he was suffering from a bad headache.
zh: 他说他正遭受严重的头痛。

en: Keep away from me because I have a bad cold.
zh: 离我远点，因为我得了重感冒。

en: A bad cold prevented her from attending the class.
zh: 重感冒阻止了她上课。

en: I have recovered from my bad cold.
zh: 我已经从重感冒中恢复过来了。

en: I have not got rid of my bad cold yet.
zh: 我还没摆脱重感冒。

en: A hard wind is blowing.
zh: 风刮得很厉害。

en: I have a bad headache.
zh: 我头疼得很厉害。

en: I had a bad headache. That's why I went to bed early.
zh: 我头疼得很厉害。这就是我早睡的原因。

en: This is a terrible climate.
zh: 这是一种糟糕的气候。

en: Bad weather oppressed me.
zh: 恶劣的天气让我感到压抑。

en: It was dreadful weather.
zh: 天气非常糟糕。

en: I have terrible pains.
zh: 我感到剧烈的疼痛。

en: The heavy snow kept us from going out.
zh: 大雪让我们无法出门。

en: They were deep in the red and closed up shop.
zh: 他们负债累累，倒闭关门了。

en: A heavy snowstorm kept us from going out.
zh: 一场大雪暴风雪让我们无法出门。

en: A critically wounded elephant went berserk and attacked every living thing in his path.
zh: 一头身受重伤的大象狂性大发，攻击它路上的所有生物。

en: In spite of the terrible congestion, I was in time for the appointment.
zh: 尽管交通非常拥堵，我还是及时赶到了约会地点。

en: Bad treatment fanned his dislike to hate.
zh: 糟糕的待遇使他的厌恶变成了憎恨。

en: I think the rain's getting heavier.
zh: 我觉得雨越下越大了。

en: The noise of the heavy traffic kept me awake all night.
zh: 交通的喧嚣声吵得我整夜无法入睡。

en: Terrible shooting broke out the night before last.
zh: 前天晚上发生了可怕的枪击事件。

en: It was so cold that we lost the use of our hands.
zh: 天气太冷了，我们的手都冻僵了。

en: The heavy rain compelled us to put off our departure.
zh: 大雨迫使我们推迟了出发。

en: He could not go out because of the heavy rain.
zh: 因为下大雨，他不能出门。

en: They started in spite of the heavy rain.
zh: 尽管下着大雨，他们还是出发了。

en: We were late for school because it rained heavily.
zh: 因为下大雨，我们上学迟到了。

en: It's shameful, the way he wastes money.
zh: 他浪费钱的方式真可耻。

en: I'm sorry that you've been badly injured.
zh: 很抱歉你受了重伤。

en: He is hurt badly and is unconscious; that is, he can't think, speak, or hear.
zh: 他伤得很重，已经失去知觉了；也就是说，他不能思考、说话或听见。

en: Hideo turned the steering wheel sharply to avoid the bicyclist.
zh: 为了避开骑自行车的人，秀夫猛地转动了方向盘。

en: I paid for the video in five installments.
zh: 我分五次付清了录像带的钱。

en: I watched a movie on video.
zh: 我看了一部录像电影。

en: It doesn't pay to play video games.
zh: 玩电子游戏是不值得的。

en: The video shop is open until 3 o'clock.
zh: 录像带商店营业到三点。

en: You're sick!
zh: 你真恶心！

en: I'd like to marry a girl who likes to play video games.
zh: 我想娶一个喜欢玩电子游戏的女孩。

en: The teacher told me that Hitler killed himself.
zh: 老师告诉我希特勒自杀了。

en: Whoever the pitcher may be, he will not be able to strike out our best hitter.
zh: 不管投手是谁，他都无法三振我们最好的击球手。

en: Try on this new suit to see if it fits well.
zh: 试试这套新西装，看看是否合身。

en: Sheep provide us with wool.
zh: 绵羊为我们提供羊毛。

en: It is time to feed the sheep.
zh: 该喂羊了。

en: We were struck dumb with astonishment.
zh: 我们惊讶得说不出话来。

en: He was in open-mouthed amazement.
zh: 他张着嘴，十分惊讶。

en: I was agreeably surprised.
zh: 我感到惊喜。

en: Oh my gosh! You're the last person I expected to meet in a situation like this.
zh: 天啊！在这种情况下，我最没想到会遇到你。

en: A pick is a long handled tool used for breaking up hard ground surfaces.
zh: 镐是一种长柄工具，用于破碎坚硬的地面。

en: We are annoyed at the constant noise.
zh: 我们对持续不断的噪音感到恼火。

en: I don't want you to ring me up all the time.
zh: 我不希望你总是打电话给我。

en: Where's the aisle for vitamins?
zh: 维生素的货架在哪儿？

en: You should eat some vegetables rich in vitamins.
zh: 你应该吃一些富含维生素的蔬菜。

en: Foods rich in vitamin E include dark-green, leafy vegetables, beans, nuts and whole-grain cereals.
zh: 富含维生素E的食物包括深绿色叶类蔬菜、豆类、坚果和全谷类谷物。

en: I ate a fresh lemon for the vitamin C.
zh: 我吃了一个新鲜的柠檬来补充维生素C。

en: A man with a gun urged him into the car.
zh: 一个持枪男子逼他上了车。

en: The police came as soon as they heard the gunfire.
zh: 警察一听到枪声就赶来了。

en: I hurt my elbow.
zh: 我弄伤了我的胳膊肘。

en: A pistol bullet went clean through his leg.
zh: 一颗手枪子弹穿透了他的腿。

en: A successful business is built on careful financial management.
zh: 成功的企业建立在谨慎的财务管理之上。

en: A businessman is working out some figures with a calculator.
zh: 一位商人正在用计算器计算一些数字。

en: I would like to go to a business school.
zh: 我想去商学院。

en: What is the procedure for getting a visa?
zh: 办理签证的程序是什么？

en: Why don't we order pizza?
zh: 我们为什么不点披萨呢？

en: I applied for a visa.
zh: 我申请了签证。

en: We are going downtown to eat pizza.
zh: 我们要去市中心吃披萨。

en: Please help yourself to the pizza.
zh: 请随便吃披萨。

en: Can I switch over from a sightseeing visa to a business one?
zh: 我可以把观光签证转成商务签证吗？

en: It'll be impossible to get a visa at short notice.
zh: 临时抱佛脚办签证是不可能的。

en: Many of the things Pizzaro had heard about the Inca treasure were true.
zh: 皮萨罗听说的关于印加宝藏的很多事情都是真的。

en: Pizza is my favorite food.
zh: 披萨是我最喜欢的食物。

en: Can I pay with my VISA?
zh: 我可以用维萨卡支付吗？

en: Pizza is the kind of food that fits into today's life style.
zh: 披萨是那种适合当今生活方式的食物。

en: Could you please issue me a visa again?
zh: 请您再给我签发一次签证好吗？

en: Please extend this visa.
zh: 请延长这个签证。

en: This school was recommended to me by someone I asked to help me with the visa application process.
zh: 这所学校是别人推荐给我的，我请他帮我办理签证申请。

en: I'm afraid I have water in my knee joint.
zh: 恐怕我的膝关节里有积水。

en: The eaves are dripping.
zh: 屋檐在滴水。

en: Do you accept Visa card?

zh: 光号列车在东京和新大阪之间运行，需要三个小时十分钟。

zh: 像毕加索这样的画家很少见。

en: I'm off beer.

en: I'd like a glass of beer.
zh: 我想要一杯啤酒。

en: Have you got any beer?

zh: 我知道怎么做俄式烩牛肉。

zh: 你的炖牛肉想怎么做？

en: Peanut butter and jelly, please.
zh: 请给我花生酱和果冻。

zh: 披头士乐队以他们令人难以置信的音乐震撼了世界。

zh: 披头士乐队由四位音乐家组成。

zh: 披头士乐队在年轻人中很受欢迎。

en: Pete came coasting down the hill on his sled.
zh: 皮特坐在雪橇上，顺着山坡滑了下来。

en: Let's go to the beach.
zh: 我们去海滩吧。

en: Peter didn't intend to break the vase.
zh: 彼得不是故意要打碎花瓶的。

en: I went out with the heater on.
zh: 我出门的时候暖气还开着。

en: Peter is a merry fellow.

en: Peter has decided to leave tomorrow.
zh: 彼得决定明天离开。

en: Peter isn't anything like his father.
zh: 彼得和他父亲一点都不像。

en: Peter takes after his mother more than his father.
zh: 彼得更像他的母亲，而不是他的父亲。

zh: 彼得对他的老师表现出了应有的尊重。

en: Peter may need a new diaper.

en: Peter talks with his parents in the United States on the phone at least once a week.
zh: 彼得至少每周一次和他在美国的父母通电话。

en: Peter has been trying to find a new apartment for some time.
zh: 彼得一段时间以来一直在努力寻找新的公寓。

en: Peter was fed up with childish girls.
zh: 彼得厌倦了幼稚的女孩。

en: Peter was fed up with childish girls and wanted to meet a really mature woman.
zh: 彼得厌倦了幼稚的女孩，想认识一个真正成熟的女人。

en: Peter is not in now.

en: Peter didn't come after all.

en: Peter doesn't need to attend the meeting.
zh: 彼得不需要参加会议。

en: Peter looks very young.

en: Peter fell in love with the girl.

en: Peter remarked that the pudding was too sweet.

en: Shall I ask Peter for help?

en: Peter and Carol were at odds with each other over where to spend their vacation.

en: Peter and Eve make a handsome couple.

en: Peter came in your absence.

en: Peter, Nancy will be ready in while.

zh: 请脱掉你所有的衣服，只留下内裤和胸罩。

en: Giant pandas live only in China.

zh: 去夏威夷旅行大约要花费你200美元。

zh: 我对夏威夷不太确定，那里也有很多日本人，但我确实觉得身边至少有一些日本人会让人感到安心。我就是这么觉得的。

en: Hawaii is known as an earthly paradise.

zh: 夏威夷通常被称为“太平洋上的珍珠”。

en: The evening in Hawaii is very beautiful.
zh: 夏威夷的夜晚非常美丽。

en: The Hawaiian ocean is so beautiful.

en: He says he has been to Hawaii before.

zh: 告诉我你在夏威夷做了什么。

zh: 我打算住在夏威夷的阿姨家。

zh: 在夏威夷，人们可以全年在海里游泳。

en: Hawaii's really the land of milk and honey.
zh: 夏威夷真是个富饶之地。

en: Happy Halloween!
zh: 万圣节快乐！

en: I'll stop giving them chocolate on Valentine's Day.
zh: 情人节我不会再给他们巧克力了。

en: It is a silly practice for non-Christians to send chocolates on St. Valentine's Day.
zh: 对于非基督徒来说，在情人节送巧克力是一种愚蠢的做法。

en: Happy Valentine's Day.
zh: 情人节快乐。

en: You may have swelling, but don't worry about it.
zh: 你可能会肿胀，但不用担心。

en: How many days will it take until the swelling goes down?
zh: 肿胀消退需要几天时间？

en: Halley's Comet comes round once every eighty years.
zh: 哈雷彗星大约每八十年出现一次。

en: Halley's Comet will come back in 2061.
zh: 哈雷彗星将于2061年回归。

en: A ballet theater is a place in which I can study motion.
zh: 芭蕾舞剧院是一个我可以研究运动的地方。

en: He stands alone as a conductor of ballet music.
zh: 作为芭蕾舞音乐的指挥，他独树一帜。

en: I play volleyball a lot.
zh: 我经常打排球。

en: Do you like playing volleyball?
zh: 你喜欢打排球吗？

en: His height is a great advantage when he plays volleyball.
zh: 他的身高在打排球时是一个很大的优势。

en: Let's play volleyball.
zh: 我们去打排球吧。

en: I sprained my finger while playing volleyball.
zh: 我打排球的时候扭伤了手指。

en: Some of my classmates like volleyball and others enjoy tennis.
zh: 我的一些同学喜欢排球，另一些人喜欢网球。

en: I couldn't see the parade well from where I was.
zh: 我当时所在的位置看不清游行队伍。

en: The parade went through the crowd.
zh: 游行队伍穿过了人群。

en: The sound of the parade died away.
zh: 游行队伍的声音渐渐消失了。

en: Haruyo is undoubtedly under stress during this entrance-examination season.
zh: 毫无疑问，春代在升学考试季压力很大。

en: Haruyo steeled herself to tell Akiyoshi that she wanted to stop dating him.
zh: 春代下定决心告诉秋好她想停止约会。

en: Mr Balboa is so well known as to need no introduction.
zh: 巴尔博亚先生非常有名，无需介绍。

en: It was nice of you to come all the way.
zh: 你大老远跑来真是太好了。

en: I appreciate your coming all the way.
zh: 感谢你大老远跑来。

en: I went all the way to see her only to find her away from home.
zh: 我特地去看她，结果发现她不在家。

en: It was nice of you to come all this way to see me.
zh: 你大老远跑来看我，真是太好了。

en: I deeply appreciate your coming all the way.
zh: 我非常感谢你大老远跑来。

en: Long ago in early cultures, the ball in the game was the symbol of the sun.
zh: 很久以前，在早期文化中，游戏中的球是太阳的象征。

en: Beyond was the sea.

en: The sun rose above the horizon in the distance.

en: I saw a flash of lightning far in the distance.
zh: 我看到远处一道闪电。

en: You can see the island in the distance.
zh: 你可以看到远处的岛屿。

en: Flight 101 from Paris arrived one hour ahead of time.
zh: 从巴黎起飞的101次航班提前一小时到达。

en: All the Parisians have gone outdoors.
zh: 所有的巴黎人都到户外去了。

en: The river which flows through Paris is the Seine.

en: It will cost 500 dollars to fly to Paris.
zh: 飞往巴黎需要花费500美元。

en: It is not far to Paris.

en: It's fifty kilometers to Paris.

en: I'm thinking of going to Paris.
zh: 我正在考虑去巴黎。

en: Have you ever been to Paris?
zh: 你去过巴黎吗？

en: It was her wish to go to Paris.
zh: 去巴黎是她的愿望。

en: Paris has a great charm for Japanese girls.
zh: 巴黎对日本女孩有很大的魅力。

en: Paris is called the City of Lights. Many beautiful buildings are lit at night.
zh: 巴黎被称为光之城。 许多美丽的建筑物在夜间被点亮。

en: Paris is one of the largest cities in the world.
zh: 巴黎是世界上最大的城市之一。

en: Paris is best in autumn.
zh: 巴黎在秋天最美。

en: Paris is the capital of France.
zh: 巴黎是法国的首都。

en: Paris did her best to defend her liberties.
zh: 巴黎竭尽全力捍卫她的自由。

en: Paris, which is on the Seine, is a beautiful city.
zh: 巴黎位于塞纳河畔，是一座美丽的城市。

en: Paris fell in 1940.

en: Paris is the center of the world, in a way.
zh: 从某种意义上说，巴黎是世界的中心。

en: It is extremely hot and humid in Bali in December.
zh: 十二月巴厘岛非常炎热潮湿。

en: Corsairfly is an airline based in Paris.
zh: Corsairfly是一家总部位于巴黎的航空公司。

en: I have to brush up my French before I go to Paris to study.
zh: 在我去巴黎学习之前，我必须复习一下我的法语。

en: I visited him at intervals during my stay in Paris.
zh: 我在巴黎逗留期间不时地拜访他。

en: While staying in Paris, I happened to meet him.
zh: 在巴黎逗留期间，我偶然遇到了他。

en: I met him while I was staying in Paris.
zh: 我在巴黎逗留期间遇到了他。

en: I'm dying to see Paris.
zh: 我非常想去巴黎看看。

en: We stopped over in Athens on our way to Paris.
zh: 我们在去巴黎的途中在雅典停留了一下。

en: Could she make herself understood in French in Paris?
zh: 她在巴黎能用法语表达清楚自己的意思吗？

en: I remember meeting him in Paris.
zh: 我记得在巴黎见过他。

en: What's in fashion in Paris?
zh: 巴黎现在流行什么？

en: Evidence that Harrison did not intend this work to be a parody can be seen in his letter to Mrs. Evans.
zh: 哈里森并不打算把这部作品写成讽刺作品的证据可以在他写给埃文斯夫人的信中看到。

en: Mrs. Harris is very doubtful about her son's future.
zh: 哈里斯夫人非常怀疑她儿子的未来。

en: The victims of the hurricane have not tasted food for three days.
zh: 飓风的受害者已经三天没有尝过食物了。

en: The death toll from the hurricane climbed to 200.
zh: 飓风造成的死亡人数攀升至200人。

en: There are good grounds for the view that Paris was the scene of frequent riots even before the revolution of 1789.
zh: 有充分的理由认为，早在1789年革命之前，巴黎就经常发生骚乱。

en: First, swallow one dose of barium.
zh: 首先，喝下一剂钡剂。

en: Hollywood isn't what it used to be.
zh: 好莱坞已经不是以前的样子了。

en: Harry left his family 200 million yen when he died.
zh: 哈利去世时给家人留下了2亿日元。

en: Harry is gentle with cats.
zh: 哈利对猫很温柔。

en: Barry hits the bottle every now and then.
zh: 巴里时不时地喝几杯。

en: Harry was late for class yesterday because of his accident.
zh: 哈利昨天因为事故上课迟到了。

en: Harry managed to swim across the river.
zh: 哈利设法游过了河。

en: Harry is only 40.
zh: 哈利才40岁。

en: Harry called at Tony's house.
zh: 哈利拜访了托尼的家。

en: Harry is ashamed of having lied to Sally.
zh: 哈利对自己向莎莉撒谎感到羞愧。

en: Harry couldn't keep up with the class.
zh: 哈利跟不上班级的进度。

en: Barry Taylor's name has been put forward for the post of chairman.
zh: 巴里·泰勒的名字已被提名为主席一职。

en: Could you tell me where I could go to get a square meal?
zh: 请问哪里可以吃到一顿丰盛的饭菜？

en: Roses smell sweet.
zh: 玫瑰闻起来很香。

en: The roses bloom in spring.
zh: 玫瑰在春天盛开。

en: The roses sometimes grow wild.
zh: 玫瑰有时会野蛮生长。

en: The roses are now in full bloom.
zh: 玫瑰现在正值盛开。

en: A rose has thorns on its stem.
zh: 玫瑰的茎上有刺。

en: The rose is called the queen of flowers.
zh: 玫瑰被称为花中皇后。

en: The rose is the national flower of this country.
zh: 玫瑰是这个国家的国花。

en: I should have brought my umbrella. Large raindrops are starting to fall.
zh: 我应该带伞的。 大颗的雨点开始落下来了。

en: I read an exciting story.
zh: 我读了一个精彩的故事。

en: This is a great moment.
zh: 这是一个伟大的时刻。

en: A rose smells sweet.
zh: 玫瑰闻起来很香。

en: The roses are in bud.
zh: 玫瑰含苞待放。

en: A rose by any other name would smell as sweet.
zh: 玫瑰不叫玫瑰，依然芳香。

en: A rose is sweeter in the bud than full blown.
zh: 含苞的玫瑰比盛开的更甜美。

en: The perfume of roses filled the room.
zh: 玫瑰的香味充满了房间。

en: The smell of roses hung in the air.
zh: 空气中弥漫着玫瑰的香味。

en: There is nothing I like so much as the smell of roses.
zh: 我最喜欢玫瑰的香味。

en: The roses are in full bloom.
zh: 玫瑰花盛开了。

en: It's as lovely as a rose.
zh: 它像玫瑰一样可爱。

en: The smell of roses filled the room.
zh: 玫瑰的香味充满了房间。

en: It is better to be stung by a nettle than pricked by a rose.
zh: 宁可被荨麻刺伤，也不愿被玫瑰刺伤。

en: Gather ye rosebuds while ye may.
zh: 及时行乐。

en: A parasol is used during the summertime to shade the face.
zh: 夏天使用阳伞来遮挡阳光。

en: The roses are in bloom.
zh: 玫瑰花开了。

en: Let's go early, shall we?
zh: 我们早点去吧，好吗？

en: Quick, run after him.
zh: 快，追上他。

en: Would you slice me a piece of ham, please?
zh: 请你帮我切一片火腿好吗？

en: I will have read Hamlet three times if I read it again.
zh: 如果我再读一遍《哈姆雷特》，我就读过三遍了。

en: Hamlet acts as if he were insane.
zh: 哈姆雷特的行为举止好像疯了一样。

en: Who wrote Hamlet?
zh: 谁写了《哈姆雷特》？

en: Who acts Hamlet?
zh: 谁扮演哈姆雷特？

en: Can you quote a line of Hamlet?
zh: 你能引用《哈姆雷特》里的一句台词吗？

en: There are 340 species of hummingbirds.
zh: 蜂鸟有340个品种。

en: During the bubble, people dreamed of a life of leisure.
zh: 在泡沫时期，人们梦想着休闲的生活。

en: If only I'd sold that property during the economic bubble, I wouldn't have suffered such a big loss.
zh: 要是我在经济泡沫时期卖掉那处房产就好了，我就不会遭受这么大的损失了。

en: That's because the bubble vanished into thin air.
zh: 那是因为泡沫消失得无影无踪了。

en: A pub is a popular gathering place in which to drink beer.
zh: 酒吧是一个很受欢迎的聚会场所，人们在那里喝啤酒。

en: Well, he is baptizing, and everyone is going to him.
zh: 嗯，他正在施洗，而且每个人都去找他。

en: Could you show me what you're serving in the buffet?
zh: 您能给我看看自助餐里有什么吗？

en: In the Carteret Islands, near Papua New Guinea, some people have already had to leave their homes because the seawater is washing around their houses.
zh: 在靠近巴布亚新几内亚的卡特雷特群岛，一些人已经不得不离开家园，因为海水正在冲刷他们的房屋。

en: Can I go out to play, Dad?
zh: 爸爸，我可以出去玩吗？

en: Daddy was in his office, under our flat.
zh: 爸爸在他的办公室里，就在我们公寓的楼下。

en: He said that he could smell something burning and that the telephones weren't working.
zh: 他说他闻到有东西烧焦的味道，而且电话也打不通了。

en: He brought our TV set down to the cellar.
zh: 他把我们的电视机搬到地下室去了。

en: I could say nothing in my dad's presence.
zh: 在我爸爸面前，我什么也说不出来。

en: Why don't you have Dad clean up his study?
zh: 你为什么不让爸爸清理一下他的书房呢？

en: Hang onto Daddy!
zh: 抓住爸爸！

en: I'll tell Daddy on you.
zh: 我要告诉爸爸去。

en: Daddy passed gas.
zh: 爸爸放了个屁。

en: Where are you going, Dad?
zh: 爸爸，你要去哪里？

en: So this is Lady Evans.
zh: 所以这位就是埃文斯夫人。

en: Give me a ride on your shoulders, Daddy.
zh: 爸爸，让我骑在你的肩膀上。

en: Two vanilla ice creams please.
zh: 请来两个香草冰淇淋。

en: He's very shy. He says he wants to see you.
zh: 他很害羞。他说他想见你。

en: The Panama Canal connects the Atlantic with the Pacific.
zh: 巴拿马运河连接大西洋和太平洋。

en: Your nose is running. Blow it.
zh: 你流鼻涕了。擤一下。

en: The patrol cars cover the whole of the area.
zh: 巡逻车覆盖了整个区域。

en: The patrol car pursued a speeding sports car, but it all ended in a wild-goose chase.
zh: 巡逻车追逐一辆超速行驶的跑车，但最终却是一场徒劳的追逐。

en: Patricia will organize the tournament.
zh: 帕特里夏将组织这次锦标赛。

en: The pigeon and the ostrich are both birds; one can fly and the other cannot.
zh: 鸽子和鸵鸟都是鸟类；一个能飞，另一个不能飞。

en: The dove stands for peace.
zh: 鸽子象征着和平。

en: A dove is a symbol of peace.
zh: 鸽子是和平的象征。

en: The dove is a famous symbol for peace.
zh: 鸽子是著名的和平象征。

en: The dove is a symbol of peace.
zh: 鸽子是和平的象征。

en: Do you know where Miss Hudson lives?
zh: 你知道哈德森小姐住在哪里吗？

en: Professor Hudson is my father's friend.
zh: 哈德森教授是我父亲的朋友。

en: I need a police car.
zh: 我需要一辆警车。

en: He ran away at the sight of a police patrol.
zh: 他一看到警察巡逻就跑了。

en: The police car was driving at fairly high speed.
zh: 警车开得相当快。

en: Patty exposed her back to the sun on the beach.
zh: 帕蒂在沙滩上把后背暴露在阳光下。

en: Patty was so short that she couldn't get at the branch.
zh: 帕蒂太矮了，够不着树枝。

en: Patty is a smart student.
zh: 帕蒂是个聪明的学生。

en: Patty finished writing to her friends in Canada.
zh: 帕蒂写完了给她在加拿大的朋友们的信。

en: Bach and Handel were contemporaries.
zh: 巴赫和亨德尔是同时代的人。

en: Pat stripped off his clothes and dived in.
zh: 帕特脱掉衣服跳了进去。

en: Pat is very talkative.
zh: 帕特非常健谈。

en: Pat's going to Jim's birthday party.
zh: 帕特要去参加吉姆的生日聚会。

en: Go and help them, Bud.
zh: 去帮帮他们，巴德。

en: The batteries are extra.
zh: 电池是额外的。

en: The battery gave out.
zh: 电池没电了。

en: The battery ran down.
zh: 电池耗尽了。

en: The batter struck out swinging.
zh: 击球手挥棒落空被三振出局。

en: The batter has two balls and two strikes on him.
zh: 击球手有两好球两坏球。

en: Ichiro hit an eye-popping double.
zh: 一郎击出了一个令人瞠目结舌的二垒安打。

en: I'm going to have to start lobbing. I can't win with passing shots alone.
zh: 我得开始吊高球了。我光靠穿越球赢不了。

en: My bag was stolen.
zh: 我的包被偷了。
